about_the_game:
EASOAR is heavily inspired by certain 2D action platormers from the SNES era of gaming. With a focus on build variety and customisation with fast-paced action.

  • Side-scrolling action with addicting gameplay. Climb up walls, jump over the heads of enemies and dash your way around like you're fresh out of hospital.

  • Demanding difficulty that has you fight tooth-and-nail in order to achieve victory, as a result of skill or well chosen build creation.

  • Become a master-of-arms as you purchase and stumble upon a vast array of weaponry to suit any playstyle you demand.

  • Witness surreal landscapes and fight horrible creations as a result of the innaturums, whether intentionally designed or not...

  • Explore the vast array of build progression and customisation as you stare at stat screens for 30 minutes in order to get that 10% extra damage to achieve perfection.

  • Replayability is encouraged

Innaturums:

You choose what kind of maniac wildslinger you are. But which innaturus power will you harness in your revolt against the Easoar Corporation?

  • COFFIN [CF]
    Pure power and traps, destroy everything with purple bass and leave nothing in your wake.

  • BOLIDE [BO]
    Buffs and healing, melt machinery with the power of bubbles and become a regenerating monster.

  • ALDER [AL]
    Debuffs and Summoning, become a commander over machines and a herald of suffering with cyan radiation.

Customisation:

Equip a miriad of different weapons, bombs, dashes and augments. Literally just any junk you find on the ground. Make sure to dress your best, wildslingers have standards after all.

  • Weapons: Two can be equipped at once and can be swapped between. Wield Assault Rifles, Revolvers, Flamethrowers, Swords, Miniguns that fire waves of orange, carbonated bubbles!

  • Trinkets: Items with limited uses that replenish at checkpoints, plan their usage accordingly. They are everything, such as: Bombs, Throwing Knives, Throwing Axes, Robot Summons, Plant Seeds, Soda Cans, Mini-Volcanoes, Vials of Various, Sinister Goo.

  • Augments: Powerful stat upgrades that all require different space requirements in order to fit into your build. How you use their synergies with eachother is how you become unstoppable.

  • Dashes: Movement upgrades that can either be passive or activated when dashing in mid-air. Dance around your foes or dash straight through them.

Stat Upgrades:

Weapons can be upgraded using materials found in levels. Stats can be increased to raise your affinity with a certain Innaturums, other stats like your maximum health or how many trinkets can be held at once.

Use every tool at your disposal to fight against Easoar and become a true force of innature!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has heavy depictions of violence and gore that people may find disturbing. There are also implied references of self-harm and addiction through dialogue and descriptive text.

name: EASOAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Plenty of optimization will need to be done down the road. Let me know if any other devices have trouble running this game.

Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: The Easoar Corporation has made a horrible discovery, spreading the unending potential of Innaturum weaponry. Radicalize as a wildslinger in this fast-paced, action platformer, RPG. Lay waste as you mix and match all manners of weaponry, becoming a true force of Innature!
